params.nonWaterfallRecipient: Address to recover non-waterfall tokens to
params.thresholds: Absolute payment thresholds for waterfall recipients (last recipient has no threshold & receives all residual flows)
params.token: Address of ERC20 to waterfall (0x0 used for ETH)

documentation.text: Invalid number of recipients, must have at least 2

Invalid recipient & threshold lengths; recipients must have one more
 entry than thresholds

Invalid threshold at `index`; must be < 2^96
 @param index Index of too-large threshold

Invalid threshold at `index` (thresholds must increase monotonically)
 @param index Index of out-of-order threshold
